IN SHORT: â–ªï¸ ul. 1 Sierpnia 30 â–ªï¸ 3 rooms (possible arrangement into 4â€“6 rooms) / 60.73 mÂ² + balcony + basement â–ªï¸ floor 5 of 10 (block from 1975) â–ªï¸ two-sided apartment (east-west), very bright and well-lit â–ªï¸ general renovation completed about 8 years ago (replacement of electrical installation) â–ªï¸ PVC windows, balcony, basement â–ªï¸ greenery and a square in front of the building â€“ a quiet neighborhood â–ªï¸ perfect for families, couples and investors DETAILS: This spacious apartment with a convenient layout is located in a building dating back to 1975. The building is in good condition, with updated utilities and an elevator. The apartment underwent a complete renovation (nearly eight years ago), which included new electrical wiring and interior modernization. Room layout (example of possible layout):living room (17 m2) with access to the balcony (3.4 m2) two separate bedrooms (10.5 m2 and 9.2 m2) kitchen (8.2 m2) bathroom (3 m2) Toilet (1.3 m2)hall (11.5 m2)additional possibilities in arranging the space â€“ it is possible to separate, for example, a dressing room, a small office or an additional room ADVANTAGES Two-sidedness and exposure: windows face east and west - the apartment is well-lit all day long. Basement: Provides additional storage space. Greenery under the block: There is a well-kept square beneath the building, which contributes to the comfort of residents and provides a pleasant space for relaxation. Adaptability: With a well-designed division, you can get up to 5-6 rooms â€“ an interesting option for an investor or a larger family. Technical condition: PVC windows, new electrical installation, very well-maintained apartment with well-preserved oak parquet flooring. Balcony: provides a pleasant place for coffee and relaxation. LOCATION AND COMMUNICATION The apartment is located in a very convenient part of Warsaw â€“ within reach of urban infrastructure, public transport and close to the university. Universities nearbyMedical University of Warsaw (WUM), 61 Å»wirki i Wigury Street â€“ just a few minutes to the Medical University bus stop â€“ convenient access by bus lines [numer]Other universities (UW, Politechnika, SGH, Akademie) reachable by public transport in 10â€“20 minutes â€“ excellent bus and tram connections, access to public transport routes Public transport and amenitiesDirect access to numerous bus and tram lines within a few minutes of the block Proximity to services, shops, restaurants, pharmacies, etc. Good connection to the city center, quick access to key points of Warsaw The green surroundings of the estate are perfect for walks, recreation and peace despite its urban location. FOR INVESTOR/FAMILY For investors: the location near the university and good transport links make the apartment highly rentable (to students and young families). The possibility of converting it into more rooms increases its investment appeal. For a family/couple: two-sided layout, brightness, balcony, green surroundings and infrastructure make this a comfortable place for everyday living. Don't hesitate, call and arrange a viewing! KONTAKT: Krzysztof Zegarek

ENGLISH: For Sale: 4-Room Apartment, 98.1 m?, Located on the 3rd Floor of an 8-Story Apartment Building from 2015, at 13B Rydygiera Street in Å»oliborz. THE APARTMENT: The apartment was finished in 2016 to the highest standard. The interior was carefully designed by an architect to maximize the use of space. It's a perfect option for wood lovers ? the apartment features custom-made built-in furniture crafted by a carpenter, durable scorched ash wood flooring, and even the loggia (9.55 m?) is entirely lined with pine boards. The windows face three directions, and the ceiling height is 2.78 m. The living room, kitchen, and dining area form one beautifully lit open space of approximately 35m2, with a southeast exposure. Notable features include a TV wall finished with stucco and eye-catching steel shelves, as well as a built-in wine fridge. The master bedroom (15,8m2) is connected to a walk-in closet and a spacious bathroom (over 7m2) equipped with both a bathtub and a shower. There are also two cozy bedrooms, measuring 13,4m2 and 9,2m2. The hallway (7,2m2), which includes a large closet and a built-in bench, leads to a second bathroom (3m2) with a shower, sink, toilet, and towel radiator. THE AREA: The building at 13B Rydygiera Street is part of a prestigious residential complex, ideally located in terms of access to public transport and a wide range of shops and services. The area is full of amenities, including grocery stores, restaurants, preschools, a kids' gym, and even a notary office right next to the building entrance. Westfield Arkadia shopping center is also nearby. Getting to the city center by public transport takes just a few minutes. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: The apartment comes with 2 tandem parking spaces and a nearly 5m2 storage unit on the same floor, available for an additional cost of PLN 150,000 in total. Full ownership ? purchase can be financed with a mortgage. Highly recommended ? feel free to schedule a viewing! ZainteresowaÅ‚a CiÄ™ ta oferta? ZadzwoÅ„! About the Tenement House The tenement house at Wilcza 35/41 has a rich history. Although the current building dates back to the second half of the 20th century, representative tenement houses were already standing at this address in the 19th century. Since its construction in 1950, the tenement house has been part of the MarszaÅ‚kowska Residential District, which was listed in the register of monuments three times between 2015 and 2017. In 1955, a mosaic clock was made on the building's facade, which remains there to this day; we recommend viewing it from MarszaÅ‚kowska street. Neighborhood Description The area features other tenement houses from the same period, also part of the MarszaÅ‚kowska Residential District (MDM).
